Package org.svvrl.goal.core.io

Class JFFNFWCodec

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.io.XMLCodec
org.svvrl.goal.core.io.JFFNFWCodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
Codec
public class JFFNFWCodec
extends XMLCodec
An JFFNFWCodec provides methods for encoding a classic finite state automaton with a classical alphabet in JFLAP file format (JFF) and decoding a JFF file back to a classic finite state automaton automaton with a classical alphabet. This codec is part of JFFCodec and has no name, file extension, and description.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • decodeState

      public State decodeState​(org.w3c.dom.Element e, Automaton aut) throws CodecException
      Decodes a state of the automaton to be decoded.
      Parameters:
      e - the XML element representing a state
      aut - the automaton corresponding to the GFF file
      Returns:
      the state represented by e
      Throws:
      CodecException - if the decoding of e fails

    • decodeTransition

      public Transition decodeTransition​(org.w3c.dom.Element e, Automaton aut) throws CodecException
      Decodes an XML element as a transition.
      Parameters:
      e - an XML element to be decoded
      aut - the automaton corresponding to the GFF file to be decoded
      Returns:
      the transition in aut represented by e
      Throws:
      CodecException - if the tag name or the tid attribute is invalid, or the source state or the destination state cannot be found in aut

    • getRoot

      protected org.w3c.dom.Element getRoot​(org.w3c.dom.Document doc) throws CodecException
      Returns the root element of a GFF document.
      Parameters:
      doc - the document to be decoded
      Returns:
      the root element of doc
      Throws:
      CodecException - if the tag name of the root element is invalid or there are more than one root elements

    • getType

      protected java.lang.String getType​(org.w3c.dom.Document doc) throws CodecException
      Returns the automaton type of a GFF document.
      Parameters:
      doc - the document to be decoded
      Returns:
      the type of the automaton represented by doc
      Throws:
      CodecException - if the type of the automaton represented by doc is different from the type supported by this codec

    • getAlphabet

      Parameters:
      doc - the document to be decoded
      Returns:
      the alphabet of the automaton represented by doc
      Throws:
      CodecException - if it fails to get the root element or the alphabet type is invalid
